author: Ross Burden
method: Place all of the ingredients into a large bowl. Toss together well and serve immediately.
ingredients: 2 handfuls fresh flatleaf parsley leaves, roughly chopped,  2 celery stalks, finely chopped,  3 tomatoes, deseeded and chopped,  100g/3Â½oz feta, cut into cubes,  2 tbsp tinned cannellini beans, rinsed and drained,  1 lemon, juice only,  1 tbsp olive oil,  2 tbsp black olives, pitted
